134134.「……ちっ。しつこい連中ね。\n あと少しで 逃げられたものを……。:
...Damn. They're persistent, aren't they? We
were so close to escaping...

134136.「あなたが フランジュにしたこと\n 僕らは 何もかも 知っているんです。\n:
We know everything you did to Frange. There's
no excuse for what you did to Frange.

134137.「エリシャ先生…… やはり あなたは\n 師匠の死に 関わっていたのですね。\n:
Elisha-sensei I knew you were involved in your
master's death. That's why you stole the
notebook.

134139.「答える気がないのなら いいでしょう。\n シュメリア先生に あなたを連れてくる:
If you don't want to answer, that's fine,
because Dr. Sumeria has asked me to bring you
in...

134140.「弁解があるのなら シュメリア先生の前で\n 好きなだけ してください。:
If you have an excuse, you can make it all you
want in front of Dr. Sumeria.

134141.「おっと シュメリアちゃんだけじゃねェぞ。\n 大事になりゃ 学園長や教頭だって:
Oh, Sumeria isn't the only one. The dean and the vice principal will also come out if things get serious. Neither one of them will
shut up.

134143.「それだけは かんべんして。\n 全部 話すから。:
Please don't do that. I'll tell you
everything.

134144.「知りたいことには なんでも答える。\n その代わり ここは見逃して。\n 私は:
I'll answer anything you want to know. In
exchange, you'll have to let me out of here. I
just want to get away from the academy.

134145.「そんな勝手が 通用するわけ……。:
How can such selfishness be allowed to
prevail?

134146.「ミランさん 待って！\n 私 聞きたいです。先生の話。:
Mr. Milan, wait! I want to hear it. I want to
hear about you.

134147.「まず 手帳を返してください。\n あれは 大切な物なんです。:
First of all, please give me back my notebook.
It is very important.

134150.「その辺りのこと……くわしく話す前に\n まず ザビアナの死について\n 話させ:
Before we get into the details, let me first
tell you about Zaviana's death.

134152.「あなたの予想どおり 私も ザビアナの死に\n 少しだけ 関わってるわ。\n よ:
As you might expect, I had a bit of a hand in
Zaviana's death. Or, more accurately, her
postmortem.

134153.「ザビアナが死んだ あの日……\n 埋葬の準備をするという理由で\n 彼女の遺体:
The day Zaviana died...her body was brought to
the Infirmary because they were preparing for
her burial.

134154.「そのとき 私も手伝ったから 気づけたんだけど\n 彼女の遺体には 不審な点が:
I was helping her when it happened, and I
noticed two things about her body that I
thought were suspicious.

134155.「ひとつは 胸にあった 長い針のようなもので\n 突き刺した 小さく深いキズ。\:
One was a small, deep scratch on his chest where he had been pierced with what looked like a long needle. I think that was the
direct cause of death...

134156.「ふたつめは うなじに残った 不気味な紋様。\n 私は 専門外だけど…… 何か特:
The second is the eerie pattern on the nape of
her neck. I'm not an expert, but... maybe he
was under some kind of special curse?

134157.「後者は ともかく 胸の刺しキズが\n 致命傷になってる以上 ザビアナが\n 病:
As for the latter, the announcement that
Zaviana died of illness is a complete lie,
since the stab wound to the chest was fatal.

134160.「それが あなたでないと 証明できますか？: Can you prove it wasn't you?

134161.「信じてもらうほか ないわね。: You'll just have to trust me.

134162.「師匠は なぜ あなたを調査していたの？\n あなたは 何者なんです！:
Why was your master investigating you? Who are
you?

134163.「全部 話すと 約束したはずです！:
I promised you that I would tell you
everything!

134164.「こ 興奮しないで。今 話すから。\n とにかく 落ち着いて……ね？:
Don't get excited. I'll tell you now. Just
calm down... okay?

134165.「わ…私は ある人から頼まれて\n 一連の事件の元凶……:
I've been asked by someone to look into a
series of...

134166.「願いの少年を つかまえようとしていたの。: I was trying to catch Wishing Boy.

134168.「そんな！？\n 近くにいたなんて……。: Oh no! I can't believe you were so close...

134169.「あなたの名は 言ってません！\n なのに どうして…………: I didn't say your name! How did you...

134170.「こんなことって…… いったい 何が……。: What in the world is going on...?

134172.「窓の外に 人影が……。\n ドアの向こうに 誰かがいたんです！:
I saw a figure outside the window... There was
someone behind the door!

134174.「見えたのは 一瞬だったので なんとも……。:
It was only for a moment, so I can't say for
sure...

134175.「エリシャ先生が こんなことになっちゃったら\n もう できることは なさそうね:
I guess there's nothing more we can do now
that Dr. Elisha is in this kind of trouble,
we'll have to rely on Dr. Sumeria.

134176.<pc>たちは 列車内で起こったことを\n報告するため 対策室の前まで戻った。:
<pc> and others returned to the
front of the Strategy Room to report what had
happened on the train.

151575.「ぐぬぅ…… ニンゲンどもめ。\n 校舎だけでは あきたらず ついに\n 屋外の:
Gnargh...those humans. Not content with just
the school building, they've finally reached
out to seal off the outdoors...

151576.「わが封印の異界に 足を踏み入れたこと……\n 最期の瞬間まで 後悔させてくれる:
I will rue the day I set foot in my Realm of
the Seal until my last moment.

151577.「生きて 帰れると思うな ニンゲンども！\n 菜園の封印の こやしにしてくれるわ:
Don't think you'll make it back alive, you
humans!

151578.「討ち死にする 我のふがいなさ……\n どうか お許しを……。:
Please forgive me for my failure to die in
battle...

151579.「ニンゲンどもの 魔の手から\n のがれるためにも…… お隠れください……。:
Please hide yourself from the evil hands of
humans...

151580.「なんてこった……\n すっかり 俺らが悪モンだな。: Oh my God...we're the bad guys now.

151581.「封印の守護者たちは\n 誰かを かくまってる……？: Are the Seal Guardians hiding someone?

151582.「学園を解放していく 僕らに うらみを\n 抱いてるのは かくまっている者の\n:
You're jealous of us liberating the school to
the detriment of those you're hiding, aren't
you?

151583.「やめときなって。あほヅラならべて\n 考えたって わかりゃしないんだからさぁ。:
Don't do it. You won't understand even if you
think like a fool.

151584.「無事 守護者を倒したんだし 早いとこ\n ここを解放したほうが いんじゃない？:
Now that we've successfully defeated the
Sentinel, perhaps we should let this place go
as soon as possible.

151585.解放のカギが 突然 熱を放ち始めた。:
The Liberation Key suddenly began to radiate
heat.
